T02TD2373E:10a-0: @10a * // stong pa la gnas snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD2373E:10a-1: zhing na bzhugs pa'i thabs dang shes rab tshogs //
T02TD2373E:10a-2: gzugs brnyan lta bur shes par bya //
T02TD2373E:10a-3: snying rje'i ro yis tha dad rtsod pa spangs //
T02TD2373E:10a-4: der ni kun rdzob yul gyi sha rnams bza' //
T02TD2373E:10a-5: shin tu rnam dag stong pa'i chang ni btung //
T02TD2373E:10a-6: skye 'gro skal ldan rnams la don 'di bstan //
T02TD2373E:10a-7: skal med rnams la shin tu gsang bar bya //
T02TD2373E:10a-8: rnam thar byug pas phyi nang brlan byas la //
T02TD2373E:10a-9: yul gyi longs spyod la ni ci bder spyad //
T02TD2373E:10a-10: phan tshun 'gro dang 'ong ba'i chos rnams la //
T02TD2373E:10a-11: dag dang ma dag yid la mi bya'o //
T02TD2373E:10a-12: byang chub sems kyi phreng bas rnam brgyan la //
T02TD2373E:10a-13: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nang du 'jug bya ste //
T02TD2373E:10a-14: thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad //
T02TD2373E:10a-15: lhan cig skyes pa'i g-yung mo mo spang ngo //
T02TD2373E:10a-16: klu sgrub kyi glu rdzogs so//
